question: Who was Gandhiji's candidate against S.C. Bose in the Tripuri session of the Indian National Congress?
explanation: Gandhiji did not accept the Leftist tendencies inside INC. That is why he opposed S.C. Bose in the post of president of INC at Tripuri session in the year 1939. He selected Pattabhi Sitaramayya against S.C. Bose. Pattabhi Sitaramayya lost to S.C. Bose by 203 votes.
